title: Malingering
context: [ยง124A-148] Malingering. Any person subject to this chapter who for the purpose of avoiding work, duty or service in the state military forces: (1) Feigns illness, physical disablement, mental lapse or derangement; or (2) Intentionally inflicts self-injury; shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2]
